title: Sprint Key

replies.body: You can set a sprint key in default minecraft without mods.
replies.body_tagged: You can set a sprint key in default minecraft without mods.

replies.body:
You don't have to have a mod to do this anymore.
In the settings, you can now edit your sprinting key.
When you're editing your other keys just press the shift button when you get to the sprint section.

Hope that helps :)
